This is the Django template file for Microsoft Outlook tasks.
Importing CSV into Excel in Australia was causing dates to be incorrectly interpretted
because the originally specified "n/j/Y" format is US-centric.
Changed to use "j b Y" which is unambigous for both humans and machines.
NOTE: Whilst RFC-2822 and ISO-8601 are both unambiguous

column2: the ^M character in this file exists because Outlook can only import files with Windows-style line breaks.

column22: Status{% for tasklist in tasklists %}{% for task in tasklist.tasks %}
{% if task.status == "completed" %}"Complete"{% else %}"Not Started"{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}{% endautoescape %}
